    Module
    @Citation(authors="Michael Emmerich, Nicola Beume, and Boris Naujoks",
          title="An EMO Algorithm Using the Hypervolume Measure as Selection Criterion",
          journal="Evolutionary Multi-Criterion Optimization (EMO)",
          pageFirst=62,
          pageLast=76,
          year=2005,
          month=UNKNOWN)
public class SMSModule
extends SelectorModule
    Module for the S-Metric Selection (Selector) based on the Hypervolume contribution, see Emmerich et al. 2005.
    See Also:
    Hypervolume
